overview.en: TBased on blockchain technology, smart contracts and other technology development history (HMT) public chain. HMT provides the largest cloud registration and application platform for the global family system and is based on this platform.Various types of application related to genealogy, creating an ecosystem with blood relationship as a link.
overview.zh: 基於區塊鏈技術、智能合約等技術開發史記（HMT）公鏈。史記（HMT）為全球家族體系提供最龐大的雲端註冊及應用平臺，並基於此平臺開辟各類與宗譜相關的落地應用，打造壹個以血緣關系為紐帶的生態圈。
